[#physical-substrate-cover_site-visit]
====== Site visit

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:vegetation-mapping-protocol-shapes:physical-substrate-cover:site-visit`
|Label | Site visit
|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
|Comment | Observations following the Vegetation mapping are made in the context of a site visit.
